article_title: Meeting Future Challenges Today With Video Analytics

article_metadata.description: By The AvigilonVoice Team Healthcare as a global industry is facing plenty of challenges. A population that is top-heavy with an aging demographic profile is already putting pressure on resources, driving costs up for governments, providers and consumers alike. Costs are rising around the world, but in the U.S. the trend [...]
